fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Kill one person each night, disguising their cause of death.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are role block immune.
- Under a Full Moon, your visit is astral.
- Under a Blood Moon, you will mimic the mechanics of your disguised cause of death.
(Werewolf/Pestilence Rampage, Juggernaut's Powerful Attack, Arsonist's Unstoppable Ignition)
- Detection Immunity during non-moon nights.
- Conversion Immunity
